content:

title: Sarawak Cable seeks more time over PN17 regularisation plan
summary: Loss-making Sarawak Cable Bhd has requested for a second extension of time from Bursa Securities to resolve its Practice Note 17 (PN17) status.
content:
KUALA LUMPUR (March 19): Loss-making Sarawak Cable Bhd has requested for a second extension of time from Bursa Securities to resolve its Practice Note 17 (PN17) status.
